name: Lasa (Inside The Dove Building CLE)
address: 425 Northern Ave Avenue (Inside The Dove Building CLE)
text:
Lasa
A taste of Philippines
PRICE update
I ❤️ the TBay Market

Pansit - $6

Filipino Ham and egg fried rice (only Saturdays) - $6

Springrolls - 6 for $5 / 12 for $10

Chicken / pork empanada - $2.50 each

Pork buns - $4

Ensaymada - $3

Pandesal - $7

Leche flan - $12

Image 1 (img1.webp):

MENU
Lasa
A taste of Philippines

Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.

Made to order menu - Special Orders (1 week notice required)

Kakanin
Filipino Native Delicacies

Suman (5 pairs) $20
boiled glutinous rice on a banana leaf served with coconut jam

Bibingkang Malagkit (9 round pan) $20
baked sweetened glutinous rice topped with coconut jam

Maja Blanca (9 round pan) $20
coconut milk pudding with corn kernels

Panghimagas
Filipino Desserts

Eggpie $20
creamy egg custard baked in a buttery pie crust

Leche Flan $12
steamed egg custard with caramel syrup

Frozen Meat Products

Siomai (20 pcs) $25
ground pork with shrimp and mixed veggies wrapped in a wonton wrapper

Siopao (each) $4
steamed bun with sweet and savory pork filling

Filipino Springrolls (30 pcs)
Pork $20
Chicken $30
Wrapped ground meat with carrots, onion and seasoning

Embutido (3 pcs) $15
Filipino version of meatloaf made with ground pork, raisins, pickles and mixed ground veggies

Filipino Longganiza (12 pcs) $10
Garlicky, sweet and savory pork sausages

Pork / Chicken empanada $2.50
A flakey and buttery crust filled pie with choice of ground pork or ground chicken, carrots, potato, raisins, green peas

Image 2 (img2.webp):

Noodles and Rice

Noodles / Pansit (10-12 pax) $65
Filipino stir fried noodles with chicken and mixed vegetables
smaller servings are available at the Tbay Country Market or our house pick up meals only

Filipino Chicken Noodle Soup (32 oz) $10
vermicelli noodles, chicken, onion, garlic and mixed veggies topped with spring onions

Baked Macaroni (10-12 pax) $120
sweet, meaty sauce, hearty noodles, and cheesy topping

Filipino Style Spaghetti (12-14 pax) $80
sweet, meaty sauce with hotdogs and spaghetti noodles

Filipino Ham and Egg Fried Rice (10-12 pax) $65
smaller servings are available at the Tbay Country Market only

Filipino Breads and Pastries

Ensaymada
(6 pcs) $18
(12 pcs) $35
soft, sweet dough pastry covered with butter and sugar then topped with grated cheese

Ube Ensaymada
(6 pcs) $20
(12 pcs) $40
soft, sweet dough pastry covered with butter and sugar then topped with grated cheese filled with creamy Ube (purple yam)

Pandesal (7pcs) $5
Filipino dinner rolls

Meal Packages

Hosting a party? Attending a party? Or you just want Lasa to be part of your meal, we have your Meal packages available.

Good for 10-15 pax $150
Party pan noodles / Filipino ham and egg fried rice
60 pcs springrolls
20 empanada (chicken/pork)

Good for 20-30 pax $300
2 party pan noodles / Filipino ham and egg fried rice
120 pcs springrolls
40 pcs empanada (chicken/pork)

Ala Carte or build your own meal
Party pack noodles $60
Party pan Filipino ham and egg frice rice $60
30 pcs springrolls $25
10 empanada (chicken/pork) $25
12 pcs ensaymada $30
